about_the_game:
This icon resource pack is themed around modern technology and daily necessities such as a smartphone, a laptop, mobile batteries, stationery, and energy drinks.
The variety of types and highly recognizable designs can be used not only as icons for items, but also as decal stamps.

[Modern Item Icons] Contents

Image: 1 (PNG) for Item Database
Decal Stamps: 194

This icon resource pack is themed around modern technology and daily necessities such as a smartphone, a laptop, mobile batteries, stationery, and energy drinks.
The variety of types and highly recognizable designs can be used not only as icons for items, but also as decal stamps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: Icon Resource Pack featuring modern technology and daily necessities such as smartphones, laptops, mobile batteries, stationery, and energy drinks. The wide variety and highly visible designs can be used not only as icons for items, but also as decal stamps.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
